item.title: Language
item.description: Language is one of the most facinating aspects of human beings, it effectively made us what we are right now and without it we would probably still be in the mud. To cut short, the need for expression of our thoughs and emotions leaded us to this path and gradually became one of the most important part of our lifes. The important part here I believe is the “need for expression”.
